name: The Journey of Zenda
description: Hi! Thanks for checking out my game.This is a short game that I developed during my junior year of high school to improve my coding skills. It took about nine months to make and was fun all the way through. I now want to start a new project making a completely new game. If you enjoyed this and want to see more from me please consider donating; all donations will go toward my next game in artist commissions, software cost, music, etc.. Thank you!
